title: Best of the Program | Guest: Rep. Chris Stewart | 9/26/19
description:
Glenn reads through the declassified whistleblower complaint – and it’s NOT about Joe Biden. The Media is OMITTING over 500 words of the transcript to claim that Trump just wanted dirt. But when viewed all together – the DNC servers, Trump’s secrecy, Pelosi’s flip on impeachment – it looks like Trump was not only finishing the Mueller Report, but going after the deep state! Rep. Chris Stewart calls in – fresh out of  Thursday’s hearings – to give his take on all the chaos.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
